# visualization-component



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute               | Description                                                                                                                                                             | Type      | Default          |
| -------------------- | ----------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------- |
| `configurations`     | `configurations`        | The configuration object for customizing the graph color, and legend.                                                                                                   | `any`     | `undefined`      |
| `data`               | `data`                  | Input data in JSON format for the graph.                                                                                                                                | `string`  | `'[]'`           |
| `excludeProperties`  | `exclude-properties`    | Properties to be excluded from outside the component. Defaults to an empty string.                                                                                      | `string`  | `''`             |
| `showAttributes`     | `show-attributes`       | Whether to show attributes in the graph. Defaults to true. If true it will show all the attributes/properties If false it wont show any attributes Default value : true | `boolean` | `true`           |
| `showDetailsOnHover` | `show-details-on-hover` | Whether to show hover effects on the graph nodes. Defaults to true.                                                                                                     | `boolean` | `true`           |
| `showLegend`         | `show-legend`           | Whether to show the legend in the graph. Defaults to true.                                                                                                              | `boolean` | `true`           |
| `showPrimaryLinks`   | `show-primary-links`    | Whether to show primary links in the graph. If true it will show all the links between primary nodes Defaults to true.                                                  | `boolean` | `true`           |
| `size`               | `size`                  | The size of the graph. Defaults to '1350px,650px'.                                                                                                                      | `string`  | `'1350px,650px'` |


----------------------------------------------
